name: Hypnopompia - Prototype and Pre/Post Questions.
description:
Thank you for participating in our school project experiment. The following link will send you a questionnaire. Please do that before starting the game. Note that this game requires you to have some experience with mouse and keyboard controls for playing video games. *Quick tip: You can download the game at the bottom of the page, do that while you answer the pre-questionnairre. 
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc_fqnfEmCGJ9QEKhda9XHztpEdzNJpXKnINik-...

Movement: A --> Left / D --> Right

Controls for particles *Can also be seen in-game by pressing 'TAB':

DO NOT WATCH VIDEO (unless you go under the requirements below)

If you are stuck at any moment during the game. The following video is a playthrough of the game. Watch this video only if you either stuck at a certain point in the game and use it to help you proceed further, or if you are unable to finish the game, then watch the video instead.  

*How to play the game:

Unzip folder.

Go to folder and press on the application stating: 'Press Here To Play'

If you have trouble starting the game, please reach out to us at: med805kbh2021@create.aau.dk
